content.text: Match ends, Newcastle United 0, Manchester City 1.
Second Half ends, Newcastle United 0, Manchester City 1.
Leroy Sané (Manchester City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by DeAndre Yedlin (Newcastle United).
Foul by Javier Manquillo (Newcastle United).
Raheem Sterling (Manchester City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt missed. Jonjo Shelvey (Newcastle United) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the left. Assisted by Jamaal Lascelles.
Attempt missed. Dwight Gayle (Newcastle United) header from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Christian Atsu with a cross.
Offside, Manchester City. Nicolás Otamendi tries a through ball, but Gabriel Jesus is caught offside.
Mikel Merino (Newcastle United) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Gabriel Jesus (Manchester City).
Attempt missed. Ilkay Gündogan (Manchester City) left footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the left. Assisted by Gabriel Jesus.
Substitution, Manchester City. Leroy Sané replaces Bernardo Silva.
